## Discussion

This property is a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder] object that either is focused or is the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/isFirstResponder] object in the window when [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication] originally dispatched the press event.

# responder

**Instance Property**

A responder object.

## Declaration

```swift
var responder: UIResponder? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder] object that either is focused or is the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/isFirstResponder] object in the window when [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication] originally dispatched the press event.
title: responder
